key_points: Don Lemon and Chris Cuomo have launched a new podcast titled "The Handoff".
The podcast explores their off-camera friendship and unfiltered takes on the week's news.
The name "The Handoff" derives from the nightly handover between 'Cuomo Prime Time' and 'Don Lemon Tonight'.
Cuomo reflects on the randomness and originality of their on-camera handoff, noting it has never been formally produced.
Both hosts emphasize the authenticity of their friendship, distinguishing it from typical media relationships.
Lemon highlights the diversity in his and Cuomo's friendships outside of work.
Cuomo values their extensive off-air time together, noting it as a unique aspect of their relationship.
Amidst current political turmoil, both see their interactions as a notable period in their careers.
The hosts cherish the unpredictability and genuine nature of their on-screen exchanges.
The conversation concludes with a mutual expression of love, underscoring the depth of their bond.
spokespersons: Chris Cuomo (Former Host, Cuomo Prime Time)
